mapper.select: SELECT BID, TITLE, CONTENT, TAG, VIEW_CNT, REG_ID, REG_DT, EDIT_DT FROM TBL_BOARD
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_BOARD ( BID, TITLE, CONTENT, TAG, VIEW_CNT, REG_ID, REG_DT, EDIT_DT ) VALUES ( #{bid}, #{title}, #{content}, #{tag}, 0, #{regId}, now(), now() )
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_BOARD SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content}, TAG = #{tag}, VIEW_CNT = #{viewCnt}, EDIT_ID = now() WHERE BID = #{bid}
UPDATE TBL_BOARD SET VIEW_CNT = VIEW_CNT + 1 WHERE BID = #{bid}
